mapper.insert: insert into crawler (N_Title, URL, C_Group) select #{N_Title}, #{URL}, #{C_Group} from dual where not exists (select * from crawler where N_Title=#{N_Title})
insert into crawler (S_User, S_Content, C_Group) select #{S_User}, #{S_Content}, #{C_Group} from dual where not exists (select * from crawler where S_Content=#{S_Content})
